full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: 2BP2-122263**

**Title:** In-Car Printers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (2022)

**Vendor Information:**

* Solicitation number: BPM017498/20933
* Reference number: SSC-22-00020933:T
* Contracting entity: Shared Services Canada (SSC)
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3 Canada

**Notice Requirements:**

* Publication date: November 30, 2022
* Tender closing date: December 22, 2022 14:00:00
* Amendment date: December 15, 2022
* Notice type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Regions of opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of delivery: Canada

**Contract Requirements:**

* The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires in-car mobile printers and vehicle adapters for the Electronic Summary Offence Ticketing Program.
* The contract is for the supply and delivery of:
	+ Initial units: 1,032
	+ Additional units: up to 4,000 on an as-and-when-requested basis
* Estimated quantity of commodity: 5,032 units
* Contract duration: two (2) years with two (2) one-year options to extend
* Time frame of delivery: as-and-when-requested

**Technical Specifications:**

* In-car mobile printers, batteries, and vehicle adapters must meet the mandatory technical specifications outlined in Annex A
* Suppliers must quote prices in Annex B for the initial and additional units

**Additional Information:**

* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documentation
* Contact information for Katherine Ikeson: [katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca), 613-298-2147, 613-123-4567

**Attachments:**

* [A complete link to the solicitation document can be found here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/55ABA63E-55AC-413E-AABA-168A70EECBEF)
